name: FoodInsecurityInterventionsCPT
title: Food Insecurity Interventions CPT
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: <insert metadata>

The terms in this value set represent the interventions associated with food insecurity as identified by the Gravity Project),(Data Element Scope: Supports the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation guide for the exchange of intervention data.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes CPT food insecurity interventions that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes social determinant of health general interventions used in multiple domains.)

concept.display: Medical nutrition therapy; initial assessment and intervention, individual, face-to-face with the patient, each 15 minutes
Medical nutrition therapy; re-assessment and intervention, individual, face-to-face with the patient, each 15 minutes
Medical nutrition therapy; group (2 or more individual(s)), each 30 minutes
